resources.string: You can change the city by clicking the map icon at the top
This application has been designed and developed by:
If you have something to contribute either bugs or comments for improvements, please contact me by sending an email to ignacio.glez.s @ gmail.com
The gallery images have been picked from users Juanjo Sanchez and The Fly2009 with permission from their flickr pages.
All data pertaining to the city of Córdoba (itineraries, pictures, routes) have been introduced by Jose David Expósito Cañete
All data pertaining to the city of Jerez de la Frontera (itineraries, pictures, routes) have been introduced by Alejandro Castellano Delgado (Hermandad de la Yedra)
All data pertaining to the city of San Fernando (itineraries) have been introduced by Ivan Toledo Fuentes, The images are the property of www.islapasion.net
All data pertaining to the city of Granada (itineraries, pictures, routes) have been introduced by Álvaro Díaz
Will be available via update in brief
